page.title: 11HADLEIGH INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: I've got a pink comb from there because it's where my cousin works. Harvest Hire lend out small tools to all members of the public. Dragoco make flaverings and perfumes;some of our Mothers work there. James Faithful makes floor coverings, Celotex produce ceiling boards and Siderise make many types of insulation materials. Isobelec is another company on the Indutrial Estate eleven people are employed there,there are three managers,two co-ordinators,two warehouse men and three secretaries. They sell extruded plastics,including window profiles, cladding, planks, "Peveclair" sheeting, they sell these goods to window fabricators and trade distributors.They are one of the twenty five companies on the Estate.
